i have that problem where it starts the vista recovery partition over and over again can someone tell me how to fix it plz thx

nvm i figured it out
if anyone else gets this problem you type
bootrec.exe /fixboot in the repair command prompt

Worked on multiple machines for me. Here is what I did on mine, your mileage may vary.

1) Run the program, click Uninstall. When finished, reboot.
2) Run program again, click Install. When finished, reboot.
3) Right click on computer, click activate windows now. This will take you to the Microsoft activator site. Download the file and install. When that is done, click continue and your copy of windows will be activated.
